manifest.author: Blue Heron
manifest.name: Efficient Word Count
manifest.description: Efficiently calculates and caches word counts for notes, with folder exclusion. Uses cache to avoid recalculating word counts for unchanged notes.

manifest.author: Zacchary Dempsey-Plante
manifest.name: Tag Links
manifest.description: Allows tags to be opened as links using a hotkey.

manifest.author: LukeMT, Aidan Gibson
manifest.name: Opener: New Tab by Default
manifest.description: Open links in new tabs by default. If the note is already open in another tab, it switches to it. Can also open PDFs and other file formats in System Apps when cmd/ctrl is hold.

manifest.author: thenomadlad
manifest.name: Note archiver
manifest.description: Tools to archive your notes in another folder

manifest.name: Generate Hash
manifest.description: Generates a cryptographically strong pseudorandom hash.

manifest.author: Conner Ohnesorge
manifest.name: Vim Toggle
manifest.description: A plugin for Obsidian that enables the toggling vim mode to on and off inside of the editor.

manifest.name: Table Generator
manifest.description: A plugin for generate markdown table quickly like Typora /card table in canvas .

manifest.name: Achievements

manifest.author: Carlo Zottmann
manifest.name: Blockquote Levels

manifest.author: Matthew Sumpter
manifest.name: Tag Page
manifest.description: Dynamically generate and update tag-specific pages, offering a consolidated view of each tag's references across your vault.

manifest.author: Alejandro Daniel Noel
manifest.name: Index Notes

manifest.name: Lovely-Mindmap
manifest.description: Build your own knowledge graph with smiles :-)

manifest.author: Lucas Melin
manifest.name: Red Pen

manifest.name: Note Gallery

manifest.author: oxdc
manifest.name: Vertical Tabs
manifest.description: Offer an alternative view that displays open tabs vertically, allowing users to group and organize tabs for a better navigation experience.

manifest.author: Nick Winters
manifest.name: Time Things
manifest.description: Show clock in the corner. Track total editing time of a note and the last time it was modified.

manifest.author: Joshua Michalik

manifest.description: An Obsidian plugin that adds extra features for finding related notes.

manifest.author: Pavel Frankov
manifest.name: Colored Tags

manifest.name: Better Canvas Lock
manifest.description: Enhance the read-only mode in canvas with fully lock the scroll, zoom, drag-and-drop in read-only!
